description:
It's hard to get an impression of Donny.
When he arrived, he was with two buddies and they brought several cases of beer, and proceeded to slam a beer down via some chugging technique that involves cutting holes into the beer can like a carburetor and sucking the whole can down in one fell swoop.
His friends were nice enough, but its not normally how I start a shoot off. He said he was nervous, and his friends came along for the road trip and it was kind of a big adventure for this small town kid. He was tipsy for sure.
His attitude changed when he got a full look at my setup, and realized he might have acted inappropriately for the first day on the job. (I mean really, who brings beer for their first day of work?)
Basically I sent him home to get some sleep, and we started the shoot the next day a bit fresher.
What a difference a night makes!
Instead of the quasi-tipsy party boy, I had a super serious and polite dude, who clearly thought about his friends and takes care of his own.
So on one hand I know I've got a guy who likes to party, but also can be a real professional guy.
And I can't imagine a guy better suited for porn. He says' he is deviant, but basically I think he means he is a sex addict- probably jacking off 2-3 times a day and constantly looking for pussy.
He loves to show off, and his dick is awesome. Not sure I can get him back, but will try, cuz I think he is hot!
title: Donny - Solo
